text: “læ mi xari keid khun kæ phwk cea kranan hrux? Thi phwk khea mi briphokh cak sing thi phranam khx ngxallxh thuk klaw bn man thang«thi phraxngkh thrng cækcæng kæ phwk cea læw sung sing thi phraxngkh di thrng ham kæ phwk cea nxkcak sing thi phwk cea di rab khwam khabkhan hı txngkar man theanan læa thæcring mi phukhn makmay thahı phu xun hlng phid pi dwy khwam khır fıta khxng phwk khea doy prascak khwam ru thæcring phracea khxng cea nan khux phu thi thrng rxbru ying tx phu lameid thanghlay”
